transcript: bamar from Morocco in my in my University last year there was like stickers stickers of like to say after W and stuff and then uh these these stickers like uh they were just outside the toilets where people like wash their hands and stuff it's not a very proper place and I didn't know that we had to remove them from such places no you don't have to remove them as long as they're not in the same toilet Cube there's no problem in having them are they in the toilet Cube no but like the place in the washing area in the washing area yes no no problem inshallah okay
